an3.104:4.3: Yāvatako loke assādo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
an3.104:4.6: Yāvatako loke ādīnavo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
an3.104:4.9: Yāvatakaṃ loke nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
an3.104:4.10: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
an3.104:4.11: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
an3.104:4.13: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
